summary: Hatching Dragon eggs and Aging Dragons
descriptionHtml:
*******************************************OPTIONAL FILE***********************************************************************
<br />**************************************************************************************************************************************
<br />******************************************DRAGON BREEDING*****************************************************************
<br />**************************************************************************************************************************************
<br />requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLC's
<br />
<br />***Update 0.1.5***
<br />-small fix to the dragon hatching the baby dragons spawned then flew away so i made it so they couldnt fly away
<br />-added Some trees to the breeding grounds to make it look better
<br />
<br />
<br />***Update 0.1***
<br />-added a test for dragon aging cycle from egg to hatchling to slightly older hatchling to young adult to adult each stage last 96 hours (so far the test is the dragon eggs at the breeding grounds . havent touched the dragon eggs at the dragon lairs yet)
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />this mods adds
<br />
<br />-Dragon eggs to dragon altars that hath when you approach
<br />
<br />
<br />-a floating island near the atronach stone with a mother dragon and a large clutch of eggs that can only be reached by flying
<br />
<br />(Recommend Flyable Dragon Races 4: Legendary Skies to fly as a dragon from vanilla or the DLC's (Nexus Version makes the dragons non hostile and allows you to summon the named dragon rpeists once a day)
<br />
<br />that is about it the dragon hatchlings dissapear after about 96 hours in game time and the eggs respawn
<br />
<br />
<br />___things i plan to add___
<br />
<br />-i plan to add a whole valley of dragons and dragon eggs with a player home and a quest to make the dragons friendly with you
<br />
<br />- make some (only thise i give names to
<br />
<br />-Dragon Growth cycle from egg to adult there will be 5 stages of development first stage the egg spawns then the hatchling spawns from the egg then the hatchling grows up a little then the hattchling grows up again and then the final stage is an adut form
author: Elfendrago
